page.title: 18THE GAMES WE PLAY
page.content:
Tickey scarecrow is a game. You can play it with as many people as you like. The object of the game is you have somebody who is on. Then when they tick you, you have to stand with your hands and legs apart. Then another person comes and crawls through your legs.If the person who's on sees you he or she will come and tick you, but if you stay between their legs they cannot tick you.
Tickey Chain: You choose who will be on and you give everyone else a count of ten to get away.The one who is on has to chase and tick the others.When they are ticked they all join hands and chase everyone else.When everybody is caught someone else is on for the next game.
